article_title: US State Department issues unprecedented ‘do not travel’ warning over coronavirus
article_description: The U S  State Department has issued an unprecedented  do not travel  warning to U S  citizens  as the number of coronavirus related infections jumped sharply overnight  The advisory said U S  citizens should  avoid all international travel due to the global
